name: Bunker Blasters
description:
Play as Adolf Hitler at the end of WW2 

Goal of the Game: Find a way to win the game by interacting with objects. 

Game bindings: I for Inventory, J for Journal, Tab for Menu

When in inventory: A or D to switch between items, Left click to inspect, G to use item if option available

Why did I make this Game?  This was made for fun and mostly out of boredom  

Based on Cyanide and Happiness' Episode of Bunker Blaster

Link to the Episode of Cyanide and Happiness: 

Later I might add the other chapters from the show no guarantee though.
